title: Analyze the emergence of Republican Party

content.question: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments clearly and logically. Analyze the social, political, and economic forces of the 1840s and early 1850s that led to the emergence of the Republican Party.

frqParts.text: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments clearly and logically. Analyze the social, political, and economic forces of the 1840s and early 1850s that led to the emergence of the Republican Party.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
